## Public Member Functions

### isTargetMemoryOpcode() {#a7a6204c28f022ea1e6d099fa8497bb9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool AMDGPUSelectionDAGInfo::isTargetMemoryOpcode (unsigned Opcode) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if a node with the given target-specific opcode has a memory operand.

Nodes with such opcodes can only be created with <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ae6cc63109335eefe2c5727d1e12fc820">SelectionDAG::getMemIntrinsicNode</a></code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuselectiondaginfo-h/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuselectiondaginfo-h">AMDGPUSelectionDAGInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuselectiondaginfo-cpp/#l00016">16</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuselectiondaginfo-cpp">AMDGPUSelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
